name: North European Oil Trade Oy
goal: NEOT Oy is a procurement company in North Europe, whose ambitions are supplying fuel sector with increasing amount the sustainable renewable energy in transport sector. The overall target is to diminish the need for fossil fuels and thus reducing Greenhouse Gas Emissions while helping mitigate Climate Change.
euInitiatives:
Renewable Energy Directive
Fuel Quality Directive
Decarbonization of transport
Energy Taxation
Trade
Energy Union
